text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That was fun—we made so many memories, it was like summer vacation!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Like when we tried to use fireworks and got scolded by Air Groove-san!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Or when we buried a time capsule, but nobody wrote down where it was!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Or during the test of courage, when something chased us and we all hid in a mountain cabin, trembling until morning!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It was an intense summer. So much fun.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...And I even got some nice words from the Director.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I still don't really have any goals or plans for what to do next, though.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But for now, I want to do my best in the 'Kikuka Sho'! Mmm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! I actually drafted a training plan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There's some strength training I want to start on right away today! I'll tell you all about it after we get back!
She seems fully fired up for the 'Kikuka Sho' in her own way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But everyone's running late, huh? I think it's almost time...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, we got the bus time wrong by an hour.
In any case, with a faint sense of the next step ahead, this year's summer training camp has ended.
